name: CtrlS Datacenters Ltd.
overview:
Ctrl S Datacenters Ltd is Indiaâ€™s first Certified Tier IV datacenter and is promoted by the 17 year old Pioneer Group and $20 billion NYSE listed Och-Ziff Capital. The group has a foothold in Information Technology and Infrastructure Development and has working relationship with at least 20 of the top 100 organizations in India.

CtrlS was established with the mission of protecting the most valuable assets of the knowledge economy and with a core belief of adding value to our customers. Our brand philosophy is to create new benchmarks and innovate to achieve higher industry standards.

Ctrl S is the only datacenter in India with dual active power sources from two different power generation plants. Our state-of-the-art carrier neutral datacenter with dual active paths for network & cooling ensures 100% uptime for our customers thus providing unmitigated availability, scalability and security to their mission-critical IT infrastructure. CtrlS is the only datacenter in India to have got both ISO-2000-1 & ISO 27,000-1 certifications.

Our areas of expertise include custom-built IT Infrastructure and Services suitable for large corporations, Co-location Services, Managed Services, and Disaster Recovery & Business Continuity Planning Services.

CtrlS is headquartered in Hyderabad and is establishing over 5 lakh sft of Tier IV datacenter space across all the major cities in India. We help companies retain their competitive advantage at all times by giving them the peace of mind to focus on their core business.
